test_tag: ^That voice... You swear you have heard it before, but when exactly?
^You turn around and find a boy, he was probably the same age as you. He had a lanky physique, almost frail which contrasted his height.
^Dark blue unkept locks framed his face perfectly as if it were always meant to look that way.
^His eyes widen as you stared back at him, shoulders hunched over from possibly... fear? Or bewilderment? You weren't exactly sure.

c-1: ^ You mutter your name to him, in a small wary voice.
g-0: ^He flinches at the sound of your voice, like he didn't expect for you to have one. Though, he seems to compose himself. Enough for him to speak up on his own too.
